posts.title: Flying Spaghetti Monster Decal
posts.content: Show your blind faith and give praise to the holy flying spaghetti monster with this omnipotent car decal. Beautifully capturing our lord and savior – the flying spaghetti monster – in blasphemous like detail, this decal is sure to get your car keyed up in Bible belt like areas.

posts.title: Giant Balloons
posts.content: Give your next party or celebration a fun whimsical feel by decorating the venue using these giant balloons. Available in packs of 10, each brightly colored latex balloon can be  easily inflated to a whopping 48-inch diameter.

posts.title: Water Bottle Ice Mold
posts.content: Thanks to the water bottle ice mold you’ll be able to keep your H2O icy cold without having to struggle jamming in pieces of shattered ice cubes. The mold makes long cylindrical ice cubes designed to easily slide into the mouth of plastic water bottles.

posts.title: The Football Flask
posts.content: Get a nice buzz during your next scrimmage by playing with the football flask. This sporty flask holds up to 10 shots of your favorite liquid poison and is made from a tough yet soft foam material – complete with foam cap – that spirals like a dream whether it’s empty or full.

posts.title: SAS Survival Handbook
posts.content: Luck is for chumps. Ensure you’re prepared to handle anything that comes your way by studying up with the SAS Survival Handbook. You’ll learn the latest in survival knowledge and technology ranging from basic first aid to hand-to-hand combat, and urban survival tips.

posts.title: Pocket Shower Wipes
posts.content: Keep yourself clean even if there there’s no running water source in sight by bringing along these pocket shower wipes. Each towel-sized wipe contains nourishing anti-bacterial oils and is made from 100% biodegradable bamboo.

posts.title: The Simpsons Family History Book
posts.content: Learn everything there is to know about America’s favorite animated family with The Simpsons Family History book. You’ll be taken on a trip through their comedic past to reveal all the events that transformed them into longest running prime time animated show.

posts.title: Shakespearean Star Wars Book
posts.content: Relive the iconic thrilling intergalactic adventures while satisfying your required literature reading quota with the Shakespearean Star Wars book. The book retells this classic story in Iambic pentameter alongside some gorgeous Elizabethan illustrations.

posts.title: Inflatable Water Rocker
posts.content: It’s a wild, wet, and incredibly fun free for all when the inflatable water rocker makes an appearance at your local lake or waterpark. This colossal rocker is big enough to hold up to eight people as it wobbles in every direction until only one lone survivor remains.

posts.title: Luminescent Spray Paint
posts.content: Set yourself apart from every other artist by making your creations come alive at night with luminescent spray paint. While all other art lies dormant at night, your masterpiece will take center stage as the only visible art able to be seen without a stage light.

posts.title: Do-It-Yourself Micro Brewery Kit
posts.content: Start your own microbrewery and create your own beer at home with this Mr. Beer Home Brewery Kit. This do it yourself brewery kit includes everything you need to start making your own beer and makes for a very unique gift for men/gift for dads.

posts.title: Heart Shaped Ice Cubes
posts.content: Add a little love to the beverages and cocktails you create with the heart shaped ice cubes. The mold makes up to 14 miniature ice hearts and is made from heat resistant silicone – making it great for whipping up some delicious heart shaped treats.
